title: Audi India reports 33 pc rise in retail sales in FY24
description: Audi India has recorded a 33 per cent surge in retail sales, with 7,027 units sold in the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2024, up from 5,275 units the previous year. Head of Audi India, Balbir Singh Dhillon, attributed this growth to the strong demand for their diverse product range, expressing confidence in overcoming supply challenges.
